website_summaries.verdict: A cordless handheld steamer that also serves as a HEPA air purifier.
pros: Comes with 8 purified water refills that should cover you for 40 uses
Suitable for sinus problems and allergy and cold symptoms
cons: Water refills from mypurmist must be used
if not, the apparatus could be damaged

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A SCAM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t read these good reviews- everyone who really received this says it doesn’t work. My first day with it- it doesn’t HEAT UP OR STEAM. There is no phone number on their website for you to call- that should be your first red flag. They don’t return emails either. What a scam- how are they able to be a seller on Amazon????
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Green

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after few uses,  contacted seller for replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased April 1 & it has been kept on safe storage. Only Used a few times. Like many other review mine stopped working after a few uses. Not cool since I really need it right now. For $150 the seller and manufacturer ought to make this right. I sent a message to seller we will see how they do business.
customer_reviews.author: Asha M

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Love the whole unit. I have the wireless so it is extremely easy. The mask is comfortable and the mist is nice and full. The eucalyptus aroma helps to clear your Basel passages. Great unit and you can travel with it easily. A must for people with sinus and nasel congestion I recommend this highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Kuenzel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far I have really enjoyed using this product. It is very easy to use. I have asthma & during the winter I tend to get sinus infections which result in other issues. I feel like this product when used at the first sign of trouble will prevent a lot of my problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No longer working
customer_reviews.text: Mypurmist has stopped working after 2 months. It now will not run at all. Not sure if there is warranty on this product. But this is too expensive to stop working not even 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Brena

customer_reviews.title: This has been so helpful
customer_reviews.text: I’m a singer with severe sinus issues and allergies ... this is a god send .... I use it for 15 minutes twice a day and my breathing is so much better ... the water refills and the unit price are high but if you have the issues I have it’s well worth it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Mildew and Wont Turn On
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MyPurist Free and when I opened the box it smelled like mildew. It still smells like that as if it’s been sitting in moisture for a long time. I tried using the unit and when I hit the on button it’s all blue and white and than it blinks blue and turns off. It never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dorothy Parker

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This first one I received worked beautifully for about two weeks until one day it just continued to go into automatic dry mode after a minute of use. I exchanged it. My new one that I received has been leaking water. I’m so terribly disappointed. I love the product but clearly there are problems with the design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after  a month
customer_reviews.text: I used it for about 10-15 times. Then it started malfunctioning.The start button turns the machine on but after about 10 seconds, it turns off on its own. I can hear some noise for another about few minute but that is it's usual drying cycle. I tried it many times with the same result. It also stopped heating the mist. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Bentonville, AR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I am breathing better and my seasonal allergy symptoms are not as bothersome. I would highly recommend this product. My sinuses haven’t been this healthy in years!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Defective unit..worked 1 day. Next day the temperature and the on/off buttons will blink for a few seconds then the unit will shut off. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 65 days this product leak water from the bottom and turn itself on and off.
customer_reviews.text: the red lite comes on meaning its out of water but the window shows its full and it turn off and the water begin running out of the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received an empty bottle.
customer_reviews.text: One of my ultrapure sterile water leaked in the box. Not too happy about an empty bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box this DOES NOT WORK NO STEAM AFTER CHARGING! WTH do Not buy... Please.
customer_reviews.author: Toliver

customer_reviews.title: No side affects
customer_reviews.text: One of the best equipment I used to fight my sinus problem. Help me to ease my head ache therefore I use it almost every night before I go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Zonio

customer_reviews.title: Trust and credibility
customer_reviews.text: It made my voice worse, raspy. What a shame I was really looking forward to using long term.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Follow directions and you will have no problems using the Mypurmist.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Collins

customer_reviews.title: My puremist review
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact unit. Had to return the first one as it did not work properly. I was pleased with the 2nd unit. Very soothing/ cleansing to use. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Crump

customer_reviews.title: Best steam inhaler
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other steam inhalers in the past and the my puremist is by far the best I’ve used !
customer_reviews.author: Kami Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great Product But
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the only portable humidifier out there. The battery capacity is ok, you probably get to uses out of it before needing to charge again. It confused me for a bit when it was till whirring when i turned it off but the manual says it is drying itself. The only reason why I cannot keep it was because of the electric plastic smell. It smells like a beach ball but a bit stronger. If you can withstand the smell its a good but. A bit on the expensive side. It comes with a lifetime warranty if you plan on using a lot of the sterile water cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Eljbarr

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. It just makes a loud noise and will not turn off. There is no steam or cool air. It was a waste. I was so excited to get this. I’ve wanted it for a few years now...Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Starattract

customer_reviews.title: work great for twelve 15 minute uses
customer_reviews.text: worked as advertise but stopped steaming after just a few uses. I'm giving them the benefit of the doubt and maybe mine was just defective and this is not typical but not willing to try again unless they had a 3 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: James Stathis

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The fan started smoking during the first use. I am not even going to try and replace it!
customer_reviews.author: James A. Linke

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I think the Mypurmist is the best thing for allergy sinuses and congestion. It provides instant relief easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Clintman45

customer_reviews.title: Great product but has issues
customer_reviews.text: This is unbelievable great product - it works so good to clear up nose and ear stuffiness - my only concern is my first one last 2 weeks and broke - the customer service was great and sent me a replacement one - concern is I’m not sure how long it will last and lot of reviews been the big issue and it’s not cheap - so hopefully the quality over time keeps getting better
customer_reviews.author: jtb

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed using it but very disappointed it did not work very long. After I sent it back I saw many reviews where the same thing happened to several others.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't keep a charge
customer_reviews.text: I got this in May for the pandemic, it didn't quite last 6 months. I now have to charge it before each use and of course its past the return policy
customer_reviews.author: Kebmo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Does the job that I expected. Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: James Hatt

customer_reviews.title: PERSONAL STEAMER
customer_reviews.text: GOOD IDEA BUT JUST DIDN'T WORK FOR ME THE WAY I HAD HOPED
customer_reviews.author: Danielle White

customer_reviews.title: Ongoing Costs Involved
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed! The Mypurmist is better than I expected. Overall I was quite satisfied with the product. I especially like that it is cordless; much more convenient to use than the corded, table top steamer I had been using. There are just a few things that kept me from giving it all 5 stars...mainly the costs involved in buying the steamer and then the need to buy the pure mist sterilized water.
customer_reviews.author: morsefamilymanagement

customer_reviews.title: Weak little steamer and costly refillables
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Barely heats up. You also need to keep purchasing their little water packs. You can't use any kind of water. One water vial using the highest temperature will last just one session! PRODUCT DESIGN BASED ON GREED.
customer_reviews.author: Angrygamer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A PIECE OF GARBAGE  AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this twice. Both times it worked for a few days and then stopped. When you start it, a red light comes on and shuts it down. The support site offers a fix that doesn't work. There is no telephone tech support. It says "Email us." I'm a vocalist and this is messing up my rehearsal in a desert climate. It should be called MyNoMist
customer_reviews.author: Lover of Learning

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you can adjust the temperature band add menthol to help clear your sinuses. Also like it because you can use it as a mini humidifier
customer_reviews.author: Mindy9877

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! And Here’s why , I suffer from asthma , bronchitis,allergies,and sinusitis and I cannot express the joy this product has giving me each morning when I wake up to start my day and at night to go to sleep. Highly recommend this product if you have any the condition as me you will not be disappointed! . I will mention had a slight issue with the unit I purchased but gotten taken care off under warranty ( free warranty for 2 years) and they send me a new unit right away. Amazing customer service. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service👍
customer_reviews.text: Earlier this month I received a product that wouldn’t work so the customer support team helped me calibrate it which was really nice. It stopped working after a couple weeks and ended up being defective but customer support was kind enough to send me a replacement. Although you may encounter issues with the product, customer service is quite helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT A QUALITY PRODUCT OR A QUALITY COMPANY!! I bought the Mypurmist about a year ago. I used it for a week and then stowed it for the season. When I took it out this year it turned on but would not produce any steam. I emailed the company. They had me try a bunch of fixes but nothing worked. When I asked them to replace it they refused because I could not find the receipt in spite of the fact I sent them pictures and the unique serial number. This was an expensive item that I expected it to last more than 1 week of use. I was very disappointed!.
customer_reviews.author: steven e kopitz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!! This has been a terrible allergy season. I saw the ad on fb and ordered one, hoping for some relief. Used for the first time this morning. I woke up with sinus pressure and congestion. After 15 minutes, I felt like a human being again. I will definitely be using this 2x a day!
customer_reviews.author: Angela L.

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinary product to help assist with lung health provides with every use #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Summers

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I was given this product for free in exchange for an honest review.. I really liked it. It is very easy to use and I like that I can take it anywhere. I am really looking forward to using it when I get bronchitis.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Use it...it works wonders!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use and portable. This is a Godsent and you can use it daily. Makes my days so much better and so easy to use. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi F.

customer_reviews.title: Cordless and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: i love my ULtrapure Personal Steam Inhaler. I love that it is cordless and so easy to use. I have hay fever in the summer time and this product has been wonderful to use.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: The product is great to open up sinus when you are congested. I like the fact that it’s portable, no need to stand over a bowl of steam with a towel on your head!
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Liked the concept of this product. At first was not sure what to think about how this would work. I was pleasantly surprised how easy and well this works. It really does help.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Good for allergy season
customer_reviews.text: It helped me during this allergy season. I usually use a water mist but this worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny2

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: Used for stuffed up nose. Seem to work well. Had to return for exchange .quit working no problems in exchange..
customer_reviews.author: peggy berry

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Mypurmist Ultrapure Steam inhaler twice now and it has really help with my sinus pressure and nasal congestion due to allergies. My adenoids are no longer swollen. The inhaler is very easy to use and I love the aroma that the scentpad gives when set to the HEPA air purifier.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamy1192

customer_reviews.title: Nice inhaler but costly
customer_reviews.text: I thought the Mypurist Free Cordless Ultrapure Steam Inhaler was nice, especially for helping me breathe at night. I have allergies and this really helped to open my nasal passages. It's also great for a facial except it only lets out cool steam. I did have a few issues with it leaking so not sure if I would buy this product. It is good as an inhaler, humidifier and steamer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great steam inhaler
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. Easy to use and very soothing. I have chronic sinus problems and this relieved the dryness and congestion. Also very soothing on my throat. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
customer_reviews.author: debbie tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I rely on this product and it works! I have never experienced such amazing customer service with this company. They are simply amazing. I’ve owned mine for almost a year now.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Omg it opens you up you breath doo much more better I love it so much I tell everyone I know about it thank you #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Steele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This works so easily and great. I like that it is cordless so it is easy to use anyplace. It provides a great amount of steam and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Reetl1

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. It is easy to setup and use. I suffer from allergies and I have found using the Purmist has lessened the sinus pressure from allergies. It also does wonders to soothe my throat The only drawback is you cannot use it while charging. I like the fact that it is cordless but I would like the option of being able to use the cord if I forget to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Deeyah

product_meta.title: New! 2020 Model Mypurmist Free Ultrapure Handheld Personal Steam Inhaler (Cordless), Vaporizer and Humidifier
feature_bullets: Provides 100% natural, drug-free, and ultrapure therapy for sinus congestion, colds and allergies.
Only mypurmist free is cordless so that you are free to enjoy instant natural therapy anywhere, anytime.

The only steam inhaler to combine pure 99.9999% germ-free steam with 99.97% HEPA air purification. The result is therapeutic pure warm mist - effectively free from germs, allergens and pollutants. A new level of effectiveness and purity only available with cordless Mypurmist Free..
A proven natural doctor-recommended therapy for your sinuses, nose and throat.
Instant, natural and ultrapure therapy for your congestion. Get relief today!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
